name: Power Source
overview: This demo disc retailed for GBP 9.99, all proceeds went to The Prince' Trust. The title of the multivideo is "Blown Away". Playable demos: Destruction Derby 2 Excalibur 2555 Exhumed Monster Trucks Porsche Challenge Riot Robotron X Spider Tomb Raider Trailers: Ace Combat Cool Boarders 2 Die Hard Trilogy MDK Resident Evil Tekken 2 Tomb Raider Wipeout 2097 ... and more Net Yaroze Snave Other content: Net Yaroze?
